title: Door (Port Sarim Jail)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The door is a pickable prison cell door found in the Port Sarim Jail. Players can get locked up in the cell by declaring themselves as an outlaw to Shantay and refusing to pay the fine twice. Attempting to pick-lock the door requires a Thieving level of 1, granting 4 experience if successful. Unsuccessful attempts will occasionally grant the player 1 experience. No experience will be awarded for these actions in free-to-play. It is not possible to pick the lock on the door from the outside.

Door

Advanced data
Object ID9565

The door is a pickable prison cell door found in the Port Sarim Jail. Players can get locked up in the cell by declaring themselves as an outlaw to Shantay and refusing to pay the fine twice. Attempting to pick-lock the door requires a Thieving level of 1, granting 4 experience if successful. Unsuccessful attempts will occasionally grant the player 1 experience. No experience will be awarded for these actions in free-to-play. It is not possible to pick the lock on the door from the outside.

The door can also be found inside the Black Knights' Fortress.
